text: Arthur Edwin "Art" Cook (March 19, 1928 â€“ February 21, 2021) was an American sports shooter. He won a gold medal in the 50 metre rifle prone event at the 1948 Summer Olympics in London. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Washington, D.C.
